content: **crocheted coaster in a flower-shape in drops paris ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no w-818 yarn group c or a + a ------------------------------------------------------- **size** the coaster measures approx 11 cm in diameter **materials** drops paris from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 50 g colour 35 vanilla 50 g colour 19 light yellow 50 g colour 27 peach 50 g colour 14 dandelion 50 g colour 58 powder pink 50 g colour 20 blush 50 g colour 57 baby pink 1 coaster weighs approx 10 g **crochet gauge ** 16 treble crochets in width and 8 row in height = 10 x 10 cm crochet hook drops crochet hook size 4 5 mm hook size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger hook size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller hook size
